20648175702863015478.Text: Travel to Ald Velothi and head east past the Daedric ruin of Ashalmawia. Continue due east until you reach the mountains. Then follow the trails south until you see another Daedric ruin. Be careful in Maelkashishi, %PCName. The followers of Sheogorath are unpredictable. Don't go further into the ruins than you must.
